Important Articles.headline: HOUSTON, March 13, 2025--Skild AI, a company creating AI foundation models and software designed to drive a diverse range of robotic devices and applications, is powering an exponential expansion of its engineering operations with a secure, private AI-as-a-service solution by STN comprising AI servers and storage solutions from Hewlett Packard Enterprise (NYSE: HPE). The deployment will advance Skild AI’s development of artificial general intelligence (AGI) rooted in the physical world.
Important Articles.title: Skild AI Accelerates Development of Human-like Robot Brain with AI Solutions from Hewlett Packard Enterprise

Important Articles.headline: Shares of Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) are getting clobbered on Friday. It comes after the tech giant reported underwhelming first quarter results and issued disappointing guidance. In an interview with Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi, HPE CEO Antonio Neri says that for the first quarter, the "disappointment was on one specific metric, which was the server operative margins, which came below what the Street had in their consensus. And that had to do with the fact that we found a couple of issues that we could have executed better." On the outlook, Neri mentioned a number of issues that are weighing on the business, including tariffs. Watch the video above to hear Neri weigh in on the state of the company's bid to buy Juniper Networks (JNPR) and how government budget cuts may weigh on the business in the future. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Stephanie Mikulich.
Important Articles.title: HPE earnings: CEO explains why in one key metric fell short
